Abstract: Pakistan's government welcomes freeing of passengers held hostage aboard hijacked Indian Airlines plane in Afghanistan and praises that country's Taliban leaders for the way they managed the crisis (M)
Snippet: Pakistan's government welcomes freeing of passengers held hostage aboard hijacked Indian Airlines plane in Afghanistan and praises that country's Taliban leaders for the way they managed the crisis (M)
LeadParagraph: Pakistan's government today welcomed the peaceful end of the hijacking ordeal in neighboring Afghanistan and, like a proud older brother, praised that country's Taliban leaders for ''showing great responsibility and maturity'' in managing the crisis.

Headline.Main: Pakistan Welcomes Hijacking's End and Praises the Taliban
Headline.PrintHeadline: Pakistan Welcomes Hijacking's End and Praises the Taliban
